author: Mike
content: Sold all positions before it's too late. Don't want to hold overnight anything before CPI and PPI numbers tomorrow and friday.

author: Phil
content: Bullish: So many negative comments. trying to drive price down before earnings, would you rather buy after earnings?

author: Jake
content: I was going to get back in after earnings but the most money I've made with Nvidia is by sticking with it long term. Sometimes when I trade out of it into something else I lose money and sometimes make money, like I did in the past week by getting into Tesla...but now I'm back into Nvidia.

content: I'm not buying nothing I bought it real cheap and I'm holding on

content: Bullish: The fundamentals of this company still apply. Listen to any previous earnings call and you’ll be amazed at how much nvidia is involved in. Great stock to own longterm. I’m sure its above $200 next year or more
